## What Makes a Good Figure?

--

- Does not misrepresent the data.

--
- Tells a clear story
  - Straightforward message, easy to read, hard to misinterpret.
  
--
- Low cognitive load.
 - Reader does not need to "think too hard" to understand the message
- Does not mean 'less data', just clearer presentation
  
--
- Accessible
  - Colourblind-friendly
  - Good contrast
  - Accessible font choices
  
--
- An accessible figure is a better figure.
